topic.title: Download not working in Firefox 48
topic.body:
After clicking a download link and waiting for a bit, Firefox opens an new window with the following text:

```
Remote XUL

This page uses an unsupported technology that is no longer available by default in Firefox.

    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.
```

Downloads work in Chromium.

topic.title: Display File Size
topic.body:
There is no indication how big the files are. This would be good to know how long it will take to load a file. 

Also, it would be good if there was some kind of progress bar for the download. Maybe similar to what mega.nz does?

1_1FEikAyxCNPJcW996B69r5UFg29yfq579m.body: Should I file an issue on the Zeronet Github then? Do you have any additional info I should add? (other than a link to the site)

8_1CSc14JKdGAQJfQsfCLrduhB6zU4oEMwBf.body: In my experience, KeePassX works much better on Linux, compared to the normal KeePass. So it would be nice to add that. There's also Keepass2Android (for Android obviously).
